document_title: Nephrotic syndrome: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_content: Patients need to see a doctor immediately if the above symptoms appear, especially foamy urine. Early diagnosis and treatment will slow down disease progression, help restore health faster, avoid unfortunate complications, especially reduce the risk of chronic kidney failure.
subsection_title: hoi chung than hu.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
hoi chung than hu.json. When to see a doctor?
Patients need to see a doctor immediately if the above symptoms appear, especially foamy urine. Early diagnosis and treatment will slow down disease progression, help restore health faster, avoid unfortunate complications, especially reduce the risk of chronic kidney failure.
